channel.title: The Best (maybe) Films, ever
channel.description: If you want to read reviews about pointless facts about things that sort of has nothing to do with the film or if you just want to waste your own time then check this out...or not.

item.title: The Dark Knight
item.description: So it's finally over, with the arrival of the dark knight, the modern Batman trilogy comes to an end

item.title: Ted
item.description: Hey guess what people who suffers from OCD, Seth McFarlane made a movie

item.title: Brave
item.description: So yeah,Pixar made their first disney princess-type of film and I heard it was like

item.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
item.description: I loved the first three Sam Reimi (is that right) Spiderman films, no wait, scratch that, I love the first two, I laughed at the third one.
